Class Phone

java.lang.Object
Phone
public class Phone
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents phones and provides certain manipulations of them.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Phone​(java.lang.String requiredPhoneName, java.lang.String requiredModel, Account requiredAccountName)
    Construct a phone.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Accept call and call minusBalance method so balance in the account is reduced.

    Get the provider name of an account

    Checks whether the desired amount of seconds is more than balance allows to call.

    Get the account object.
    int getBalance()
    Get balance on the account

    provides phone's name and model representation.

    calls method from the Account class so balance in the account is toped up.
    java.lang.String toString()
    Provides phone's name and model, total number of seconds called provider name and balance on the account representation.

      Construct a phone.

      requiredPhoneName - The required phone name.
      requiredModel - The required phone model.
      requiredAccountName - The required account name.

  • Method Details

    • getAccountName

      public Account getAccountName()
      Get the account object.
      Returns:
      The accountName.

    • AccountName

      public java.lang.String AccountName()
      Get the provider name of an account
      Returns:
      The provider name.

    • getPhone

      public java.lang.String getPhone()
      provides phone's name and model representation.
      Returns:
      A string phoneName model representation of the phone.

    • getBalance

      public int getBalance()
      Get balance on the account
      Returns:
      The balance on the account.

    • toppingUp

      public void toppingUp​(int pounds)
      calls method from the Account class so balance in the account is toped up.
      Parameters:
      pounds - Pounds that are topped up on the account.

    • acceptCall

      public int acceptCall​(int sec)
      Accept call and call minusBalance method so balance in the account is reduced.
      Parameters:
      sec - The desired amount of seconds of the phone call.
      Returns:
      available number of seconds

    • compare

      public boolean compare​(int sec)
      Checks whether the desired amount of seconds is more than balance allows to call. If yes - true and vice versa.
      Parameters:
      sec - The desired amount of seconds of the phone call.
      Returns:
      True or False

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Provides phone's name and model, total number of seconds called provider name and balance on the account representation.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      A string Phone(phone name and model, total number of seconds, Account(provider name, balance))
